sentences.en: An augmentation that increases the strength and wisdom of the templar's ally.
sentences.cn: 提升牧师或其盟友的智慧和力量.

sentences.en: Breast augmentation by transplantation of adipose tissue - derived stem cells was featured in The Wall Street Journal.
sentences.cn: 隆乳移植脂肪组织源性干细胞是精选华尔街日报.

sentences.en: Butt augmentation, or butt implants, which is exactly what It'sounds like.
sentences.cn: 丰臀或隆臀手术, 听字面意思就懂得是啥子.

sentences.en: By optimizing ejector combustor geometry, ejector rocket in SMC combustion mode can obtain comparable thrust augmentation.
sentences.cn: 通过优化引射器后体结构, 在SMC二级燃烧模式下工作的引射火箭可以产生较大的推力增强.

sentences.en: Chin augmentation with autogenous mandibular bone is an ideal method for genioplasty.
sentences.cn: 结论　自体下颌骨移植隆颏,无排异等不良反应,移植骨块与颏部能牢固愈合,术后效果满意,是一种理想的颏部美容手术方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion Augmentation chin with autogenous mandibule bone is a good method.
sentences.cn: 结论:下颌角肥大伴有小颏畸形患者行下颌角骨移植隆颏是一举两得的好方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Autogenous tooth is one of good reconstructive materials in augmentation rhinoplasty.
sentences.cn: 结论: 自体牙用于隆鼻是比较好的矫正鼻畸形修复材料.

sentences.en: Enchanters use their magical formulae to grant permanent augmentation to weapons, armor and other equipment.
sentences.cn: 附魔师使用魔法对武器 、 盔甲和其它装备施加临时或永久的增强效果.

sentences.en: However, it is more interesting and fun studying with digital textbooks, which has augmentation contents and videos.
sentences.cn: 然而，电子教科书增加了内容和视频，用它来学习更令人感兴趣也更有乐趣。

sentences.en: Learn the craft augmentation with the new Inscription profession.
sentences.cn: 商业技能的升级,出现了新的商业技能——卷轴职业?

sentences.en: Learn the craft of spell augmentation with the new Inion profession.
sentences.cn: 增加新的商业技能:抄写师.

sentences.en: Objective : To provide measuring methods and a quantity index for alveolar ridge augmentation at mandibularposterior area.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为下颌后牙区牙槽嵴增高术提供临床测量方法及定量指标.

sentences.en: Prevention and management of complication of augmentation rhinoplasty with silicone . Lu kaihua, Liu Jianbo , Ai Yufeng.
sentences.cn: 目的为了预防固体硅胶隆鼻术的并发症, 提高隆鼻术的效果.

sentences.en: That assessment prompted a rapid and massive augmentation of support in the form of international teams of specialized staff, presently in Uige and Luanda, and several shipments of supplies.
sentences.cn: 该评估促使以目前在威热和罗安达的国际专科工作人员小组的形式迅速大量增加支持，并且已几次发运用品。

sentences.en: The financial burden which originates from rapid augmentation of senior high schools makes cost - sharing inevitable.
sentences.cn: 我国普通高中的快速发展,使教育成本分担成为一种缓解财政压力的选择.

sentences.en: This invention relates generally to a lift augmentation system for an airframe.
sentences.cn: 本发明总体涉及一种用于飞行器机体的提升力增大装置.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the research and application of flight dynamics in design of control augmentation system.
sentences.cn: 介绍了飞行力学在某型飞机控制增稳系统设计中的研究和应用.

trans.tran_en: the act of augmenting or the state of being augmented
